actions.name: Paralyzing Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage. If the target is a living creature  it makes a DC 10 Constitution saving throw. On a failure  the target is paralyzed for 1 minute. The target repeats the saving throw at the end of its turns  ending the effect on itself on a success. If the targets saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it  it is immune to any Paralyzing Claw for 24 hours.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one incapacitated creature. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Stench
special_abilities.desc: A creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the ghast makes a DC 10 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, it is poisoned until the start of its next turn. On a success, it is immune to any ghasts Stench for 24 hours.

special_abilities.name: Turning Defiance
special_abilities.desc: The ghast and any ghouls within 30 feet make saving throws against being turned with advantage.

special_abilities.name: Undead Nature
special_abilities.desc: Ghouls and ghasts dont require air, sustenance, or sleep.
